title: GPU mining not work
body:
```
# export GO_OPENCL=true
# make geth
# ./build/bin/geth gpuinfo
=============================================
============ OpenCL Device Info =============
=============================================
Platform id              0
Platform Name            AMD Accelerated Parallel Processing
Platform Vendor          Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.
Platform Version         OpenCL 1.2 AMD-APP (1526.3)
Platform Extensions      cl_khr_icd cl_amd_event_callback cl_amd_offline_devices 
Platform Profile         FULL_PROFILE

Device OpenCL id         0
Device id for mining     0
Device Name              Pitcairn
Vendor                   Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.
Version                  OpenCL 1.2 AMD-APP (1526.3)
Driver version           1526.3 (VM)
Address bits             32
Max clock freq           1100
Global mem size          2077229056
Max constant buffer size 65536
Max mem alloc size       1391984640
Max compute units        20
Max work group size      256
Max work item sizes      [256 256 256]
=============================================
Found 1 devices. Benchmark first GPU:       geth gpubench 0
Mine using all GPUs:                        geth --minegpu 0
```

Try start mining

```

I1208 17:20:04.579327    6440 blockchain.go:1230] imported 1 block(s) (0 queued 0 ignored) including 0 txs in 9.831104ms. #660149 [5b37d44e / 5b37d44e]
```

And no load to GPU

```
# amdconfig --od-getclocks --adapter=all

Adapter 0 - Supported device 6810
                            Core (MHz)    Memory (MHz)
           Current Clocks :    300           150
             Current Peak :    1100           1400
  Configurable Peak Range : [300-1400]     [150-1625]
                 GPU load :    0%
```
`geth minegpu` doesn't do anything. Run `geth --mine` to start mining.

@fjl, find solution forum.ethereum.org ``` -mine -minergpus '0' -autodag console ``` And it`s work fine. ``` amdconfig --od-getclocks --adapter=all Adapter 0 - Supported device 6810 Core (MHz) Memory (MHz) Current Clocks : 1100 1400 Current Peak : 1100 1400 Configurable Peak Range : [300-1400] [150-1625] GPU load : 98% ``` So, I think we need to update doc.
